snippet.title: Recipes from 'Everyday Italian'
snippet.description:
* Here are some of the recipes mentioned in the article "Sinful tastes, healthy eating" from Giada De Laurentiis' "Everyday Italian":
http://www.cnn.com/2005/SHOWBIZ/books/05/26/giada.recipes/index.html

snippet.title: Entertaining? Say 'cheese'
snippet.description:
* In the early 1990s, I wrote a cookbook that featured hors d'oeuvres. The collection included a sizable repertoire of recipes, but after its publication I have slipped into the easy habit of buying rather than preparing appetizers. Purchasing cheeses or olives or nuts to set out before a company dinner has proved a temptin...
http://www.cnn.com/2000/FOOD/news/11/07/cheese.lat/index.html

snippet.title: President crashes kids' 'state dinner'
snippet.description:
* President Barack Obama made a surprise appearance at Tuesday's kids' "state dinner" at the White House, an event thrown by the the first lady to welcome the winners of the second annual Healthy Lunchtime Challenge.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/07/09/politics/flotus-kids-state-dinner/index.html

snippet.title: Traditional holiday dishes get low-fat makeover
snippet.description:
* For those battling the bulge, the holidays can undo many long-term accomplishments in a short amount of time. But there are steps you can take to enjoy your holiday favorites, but still keep the fat content down.
http://www.cnn.com/2003/HEALTH/diet.fitness/11/26/holiday.cooking/index.html

snippet.title: Sinful tastes, healthy eating
snippet.description:
* With the low-carb craze mercifully nearing its end and balanced eating returning to the spotlight, home cooks everywhere can take joy in a slew of new cookbooks that prove delectably sinful eating can be healthy, too.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/SHOWBIZ/books/05/26/summer.cookbooks/index.html

snippet.title: 'Food on a diet' helps couple drop pounds
snippet.description:
* Kay and Mike Alexander's journey to obesity is a familiar road for many married couples. Neither was overweight when they met on a coffee break at work. Nor were they obese when they cut their wedding cake, iced with an image of Star Trek's USS Enterprise.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/07/08/health/alexanders-weight-loss/index.html
